languages.description: Un Sceau de Naberus morbidement festif.
languages.name: Sceau Sinistre Sourire de Naberus

languages.description: Un macabro sigillo festivo di Naberus.
languages.name: Sigillo Grim Grin Naberus

languages.description: Un mórbido sello festivo de Naberus.
languages.name: Sello Sonrisa sombría de Naberus

languages.description: 一枚令人毛骨悚然的纳贝流士节庆纹章。
languages.name: 鬼魅笑容纳贝流士纹章

languages.description: 陰気なNaberus祭専用のシジル。
languages.name: Grim Grin Naberus シジル

languages.description: Um brasão festivo de Naberus com um toque mórbido.
languages.name: Brasão: Sorriso Macabro de Naberus

languages.description: 令人毛骨悚然的納貝流士節慶風格紋章。
languages.name: 詭笑納貝流士紋章

languages.description: เครื่องหมาย Naberus ที่ใช้ฉลองเทศกาลอันน่าสยองขวัญ
languages.name: เครื่องหมาย: Grim Grin Naberus

languages.description: Ölümün coşkusunu yansıtan bir Naberus mührü.
languages.name: Grim Grin Naberus Mührü
